The chatbot should understand what I'm saying in everyday language, not just specific commands.
I want the chatbot to give me relevant and accurate answers to my questions.
The chatbot should get better at understanding me and providing helpful responses over time.
The chat interface should be simple and intuitive to use.
The chatbot should be able to communicate in multiple languages.
The chatbot should be able to remember my preferences and tailor its responses accordingly.
I should be able to access the chatbot anytime, day or night.
The chatbot should be able to integrate with other apps and services I use.
If the chatbot can't answer my question, it should be able to seamlessly transfer me to a human agent.
The pricing plans should be clear and easy to understand.
There should be different pricing options to fit my needs and budget.
I would like to try the chatbot for free before committing to a paid plan.
It should be easy to contact support if I have questions or need help.
I should receive a prompt response to my inquiries.

Allows administrator to configure alerts to be notified when expenses approach or exceed budget limits.
